equipped.name: (a circlet of green leaves and trailing ivy)
(a wreath of gold and platinum leaves)
(a moon diadem of silver branches and quartz points)

mobs.long_desc: A resplendent faerie goddess hovers like a shining star above the ground.
mobs.desc: Gazing upon this immortal divine being and her awesome countenance is like looking into the sun.  Her face is older than the stars yet timeless like the stones.  Wrapped in cosmic splendor, her six translucent wings unfurled in rainbow refractions, the Great Mother awakens the very earth around her with but a touch.

mobs.long_desc: A woman dressed in witch's regalia stands before the altar, chanting.
mobs.desc: Before you stands a simple human woman, physically average but brimming with dark spiritual power which reaches far beyond her.  Long blonde hair tumbles down her back, held in place with an elaborate diadem.  Her robes shimmer with their own light, giving her the appearance of being kissed by the moon itself.

mobs.keywords: tzigane vityaz woman tall swarthy tzigane-vityaz
mobs.long_desc: A tall swarthy Tzigane woman with strong features walks the path.
mobs.desc: Clad in a dark robe and carrying a shining sword and shield, this woman combines the strength of a warrior with the mystic powers of a witch.  Her features distinguish her as Tzigane, the oft caravan-dwelling nomadic people, who are frequently feared for their magical powers.  She seems deeply focused on walking this inner path.

mobs.keywords: keeper north keeper-north elf woman witch
mobs.long_desc: A waif-like elven woman makes ritual preparations before the menhir.
mobs.desc: Clad in garments made of lush green leaves and largely focused on the stone before her, this elf has most of the mannerisms of a druid.  Long jet black hair frames her narrow, ageless face.  She kneels before the menhir, tracing symbols from a few mystic traditions in the dirt, blending several types of magic.

mobs.long_desc: A jungle witch studies the menhir with rapt fascination.
mobs.desc: Though she is human, this witch looks different from those from the three major cities of North Caelia.  She is hardy and tough from a lifetime of traveling through dangerous environments.  Her skin is a golden color, her hair dark but faded from exposure to the sun.

mobs.keywords: keeper east vivacious young woman keeper-east witch
mobs.long_desc: A vivacious young witch prepares the land near the menhir, chatting with the air.
mobs.desc: Something is clearly off about this petite young brunette.  She alternates between working and having conversations with some invisible or imaginary presence.  Though human and dressed in some kind of ritual garb, her demeanor is surprisingly friendly and playful.

mobs.long_desc: A breathtakingly beautiful witch examines the menhir.
mobs.desc: This sinuous, lithe woman appears to be human at first glance, but the magnificent splendor of her beauty betrays her true nymph nature.  Nubile and pretty in a very entrancing, perhaps even deadly way, she softly hums a bewitching tune as she gracefully traces her steps around the standing stone.

mobs.long_desc: An angelic being keeps a watchful eye over the area.
mobs.desc: A golden being with white hair and white feathered wings, this envoy serves as a conduit between the divine and the mundane.  She is armed with a brilliant sword of light that shines like the sun itself.

mobs.long_desc: A majestic old unicorn has made this place its den.
mobs.desc: Looking upon this unicorn, you see reflected in its eyes wisdom of the ages and a grace of many lifetimes.  Its mane has begun to shift to a silver-gray and faint can be seen in different places on its body.  Even with these signs of aging, its nobility and virtue, still casting a holy radiance, are unparalleled.

mobs.long_desc: A Barbarian witch goes about her duties here.
mobs.desc: It is uncommon to see one of the Barbarian peoples undertaking mystical work, but she seems quite attuned to it.  Though dressed for a warmer climate than her native northern homeland, the patchwork hides and more natural look of her clothing are hallmarks aesthetics of her origins.

mobs.long_desc: A half-elf witch attends to various ritual details here.
mobs.desc: This witch's garments, comprised of a well-crafted but simple robe and silver jewelry, suggest this woman came from modest, if not excessive, wealth from one of the major cities.

mobs.long_desc: A white horse with a gleaming horn growing from its head walks the forest.
mobs.desc: From the pure white fur to the twisting horn on its head casting a holy light, this beast can only be a unicorn.  Symbols of purity and goodness, unicorns are rarely seen in the world anymore.  It is a rare privilege to behold one!

mobs.long_desc: A captivating nymph peeks out from behind a tree.
mobs.desc: As the incarnation of the highest ideal of beauty, this nymph is incredibly, painfully beautiful, alluring and charming in every possible way.  The spirit of natural beauty made flesh, nymphs inhabit beautiful natural regions, and spend their days gazing at the wild beauty that they embody.

mobs.long_desc: A fey spirit stands near an old oak tree.
mobs.desc: This silent creature stands here, like a tree amongst the surrounding forest. Her skin is like soft bark, subtle yet surprisingly resistant.  Her soft hair flows down like leaves from her head, deep emerald like the color of her emotionless eyes.  As you get a closer look, you realize this lovely creature is a dryad.

mobs.long_desc: A tiny radiant faerie dances and sings amongst the trees.
mobs.desc: Jovial and buoyant, Seelie faeries seek out the finest pleasures and most exquisite raptures in the known universe.  This faerie basks in the ambient energies of the megalith, dancing her joy of the experience.  Every step and every note is an expression of pure joy, one she invites every other being to join in.

mobs.long_desc: A ferocious manticore prowls the forest for food.
mobs.desc: This manticore is a horrid beast with the face of a man, the body of a lion, leathery bat-like wings, and a vicious scorpions tail.  Fast, deadly, and dumb, it will gladly make a meal out of anything, including you.

mobs.long_desc: A tiny glittering faerie watches you from the darkness.
mobs.desc: Not strictly evil, Unseelie faeries do often find inspiration in the abhorrent and beauty in the grotesque, making them monstrous to most mortal beings. This faerie returns your gaze with cold disdain, showing not a trace of anything but contempt at your presence.  She seems content with ignoring you in favor of soaking in the latent energy of the megalith.  For now.

mobs.keywords: huge hulking beast grey render grey-render
mobs.long_desc: A huge hulking beast with six eyes and massive claws tears through the forest!
mobs.desc: The gray render is a 9-foot-tall hulking mass of dense muscle wrapped over thick bones.  Walking hunched over on two legs, the creature's arms, ending in wicked claws, drag along the ground.  Its head is mostly a maw of black teeth and six tiny yellow eyes.

mobs.keywords: displacer beast displacer-beast sleek black feline
mobs.long_desc: A sleek black feline with two long tentacles on its back stalks you from the trees.
mobs.desc: It's nearly impossible to get a look at this creature!  It seems to be a jet-black jungle cat with six legs and two huge squid-like tentacles growing out of its back.  Most frustratingly, it has some sort of supernatural camouflage which makes it appear to be in several places at once.

mobs.long_desc: A large metal bull stomps and ruts among the trees.
mobs.desc: What can only be described as a bull made entirely out of platemail stomps through the forest.  Each reticulated plate gleams like steel, yet seems not to constrict the creature's movements.  Strange green vapors wisp from its mouth and nostrils when it exhales.

mobs.long_desc: A savage owlbear screeches at the sight of you!
mobs.desc: This creature has the body of a bear, but the head, toes and tail of an owl, and an ill temperament to outdo either.  Ferocious and wildly aggressive, owlbears are fearsome predators that will kill and eat just about anything, including adventurers like you.

mobs.long_desc: A mind-rending hundred eyed-protoplasmic beast hunts in the darkness.
mobs.desc: The shoggoth is a terrible, indescribable thing vaster than any horse or beast of burden; a shapeless aggregation of protoplasmic bubbles, faintly self-luminous, and with myriads of temporary eyes forming and unforming as pustules of greenish light all over the horrific quivering mass.  Teeth and claws erupt from the assemblage to feed its all-consuming hunger.

mobs.long_desc: A small lizard with butterfly wings flits by you.
mobs.desc: Its metallic iridescent skin glistens when the light catches it as it flies by on translucent butterfly wings.  These legendary creatures are believed to be the result of dragons remaining in the Dreaming for too long, though they are so exceedingly rare the thesis has never been provable.

mobs.long_desc: A little cat with bat wings flies by.
mobs.desc: This creature appears to be a tabby cat with bat wings.  Acting much like a feral cat does, it rolls around on its back before jumping through the air to chase a small floating light.

mobs.long_desc: A human witch tends to the land.
mobs.desc: This witch is dressed in a black robe with red lining, making her stand out from the rest of the coven.  She seems as dedicated to her part in the ritual around the megalith as any other, something about the gestures she makes and the incantations she uses is oddly different from the other witches.

objects.ground: A constellation of three tiny points of soft light floats here.

extras.text: This small constellation is made up of three motes of light that seem to be somehow bound to each other.  They gently pulse and twinkle like tiny stars. Surely such a bauble is from another world!

objects.short: a wreath of gold and platinum leaves
objects.ground: A gleaming golden wreath waits here for someone to claim it.

extras.text: Not simply metal forged to look like leaves, this wreath seems to be woven from actual gold and silver leaves, like those of the mythical trees on the Island of Paradise.

objects.ground: Someone seems to have left the severed wings of a person-sized bird here!

extras.text: Wings this large must have come from some enormous bird.  Structured like the wings of an eagle, they must be some six feet in span.  Each feather is in pristine condition, indicating dedicated care and grooming.

objects.ground: Piles of cloth scintillating like sunlight hang from a branch.

extras.text: Somehow, sunlight seems to have woven into a delicate fabric.  It hangs perfectly from the body, draping it in a delicate, gentle warmth.

objects.ground: Light coalesces here in radiant pools on the ground.

extras.text: What can only be described as liquid light has collected into a small fluid pool.  Picking it up, the pool splits into two small droplets of equal size. Strangely, they do not leave any smears or traces behind, remaining perfectly coherent.

objects.ground: A small circle of undulating light floats in midair.

extras.text: Warm to the touch and bright as the morning light, this small ring seems to have no physical structure or support.  It appears to have been made of light fused into a semi-solid and stable shape that adjusts naturally in size.

objects.ground: An ornate copper sword pommel without a blade lays on the floor.

extras.text: Motifs of the sun and its rays wrap around the pommel.  Upon picking up the copper pommel, a brilliant blade of light erupts from it!  The sword emits rays of sunlight, blazing like the sun at its zenith.  The palpable holy energy of the blade tingles as it runs down your arm.

objects.ground: There is an electrum sword pommel without a blade waiting for an owner.

extras.text: The pommel is decorated with a single upturned crescent moon.  Picking up the pommel, an ephemeral blade of glittering moonlight pours from it.  It shines with a holy radiance, a guiding light in the dark.  With each effortless swing, the blade sings with the music of the spheres.

objects.ground: A pair of silver vine bracers rest in the grass.

extras.text: A pair of entwining silver vines forms a beautiful coil pattern which fits snuggly around the upper arm.  A fine filigree snake decorates each vine with a realistic and life-like appearance.  Only the small crescent moons on the snakes' foreheads betray their ceremonial purpose.

objects.ground: A large polished disc with the image of a crescent sits upon an altar.

extras.text: This large circular shield appears to be made of silver or electrum.  It has a single curved line etched on its face, creating the image of a large crescent moon inscribed on a full moon.  Runes rune along the circular edge of the shield, forming a prayer to some ancient goddess.

objects.ground: A bell chiming a beautiful tone hangs in the wind.

extras.text: Inscribed with symbols of water and celestial bodies, this conical handbell has an appearance as beautiful as its sound.  The small hand bell is well polished and cleaned, though evidence of wear and use can be seen inside the cone.

objects.ground: A small ritual dagger of steel and black marble has been placed on an altar.

extras.text: With a handle of black marble, this double-edged dagger is ideally crafted for use in ritual magic.  A pentagram of mother-of-pearl is inlaid on the crossguard, symbolizing the union of the four directional Elements under Spirit.  Though black-handled athames are traditionally used for magic and not weaponry, it is still as sharp and dangerous as any other dagger.

objects.ground: Hanging from a fine chain is an ornate pentagram.

extras.text: The metallic image of a five pointed star is embossed on a small black disc, rimmed with what appears to be silver or platinum.  The image of the full moon, flanked on either side by mirrored crescents is lightly etched in the middle of the star.  Around the outer edge, various symbols representing the passage of time ring the pentagram.

objects.ground: Shimmering ethereal fabric dangles from a nearby tree in the moonlight.

extras.text: Multiple layers of barely tangible silver-blue fabric unfold into a full length robe with draping sleeves and hood.  The fabric itself is unlike any other in the world, seemingly made of pale light itself.  The robes are covered in tiny sequins that shimmer and quake with the slightest movement, giving the garment a shifting, scintillating appearance.

objects.short: a silver and quartz moon diadem
objects.ground: An exquisite crown of silver branches and crystals sits on a stone.

extras.text: A splay of intricately detailed silver branches forms the basis of this diadem. Affixed among the branches are several rough quartz points of various sizes, fanned out and pointing towards the heavens.  Set at the base of the diadem is an up-turned crescent moon.  The diadem clearly has some mystic purpose.

objects.ground: A string of small bells jingles in the breeze.
objects.action_desc: The delicate chain of bells jingles pleasantly.

extras.text: This small wristlet is made up of a set of tiny silver bells strung together on a leather cord.  They make a light, pleasant tinkling sound as you move.

objects.short: a silver and gold twist bracelet
objects.ground: A thin bracelet of intertwining silver and gold lay discarded here.

extras.text: Two thin strips of metal, one silver, one gold, twisted gently together form a simple, elegant bracelet.  Though it bears no signs of unique purpose, it would make an excellent accessory to just about any outfit.

objects.ground: A length of sheer ombre gossamer flutters in the breeze.

extras.text: This small gossamer scarf seems to be made of actual cobwebs and dyed for a beautiful ombre effect.  Scarves like these are often prized by the showier Fair Folk, especially faeries and pixies.

objects.ground: Resting on its side is a cast iron cauldron.

extras.text: Crudely smelted and cast to boil liquids, it is obvious this iron pot has been the origin of countless potions and mystic recipes over the years.  It looks like it would make a fine carrying vessel as well.

objects.ground: A small silver moon brooch has been left in a box.

extras.text: Looking closely at this finger-length brooch, you see a simple yet decorative crescent moon motif struck from silver.

objects.ground: A long flowing cloak, shining under the light of moon flutters in the breeze.

extras.text: You hold some unknown, almost ethereal material which has been fashioned into a cloak.  Its silver-blue color and innate luminescence makes it quite unlike any mundane fabric.  Amazingly soft to the touch, it seems this cloak was woven from the light of the moon itself.

objects.ground: A moonstone ring has been forgotten here, lost.

extras.text: Rings such as these are often used for devotional purposes as well as decorative ones.  The simple silver band has a colorful polished moonstone set into it.

objects.ground: A single glowing drop dangles from a twig.

extras.text: A crystal teardrop containing what appears to be a drop of pale silver-blue liquid light is set in a simple silver backing.

objects.short: a starstone and moonstone beaded shawl
objects.ground: A dark blue beaded shawl hangs on a hook nearby.

extras.text: Symbolic of maturity and often the Crone face of the Triple Goddess, this navy blue gossamer shawl is edged with a line of dark blue sparkling starstone beads and another of lustrous pale blue-green moonstones.  The reflective qualities of the semi precious gemstones interlaced with the natural sheen of the fabric threads give the impression of a starry night sky.

objects.ground: Swept up leaves sit in a big pile.

extras.text: Growing leafy vines have been interlaced into a living tapestry.  It wraps completely around the body, providing both camouflage and protection.

objects.ground: A small circle of green leaves sits on a stand.

extras.text: Many lush tree leaves have been woven together into a wrist-sized circle. Somehow the leaves seem fresh and green as the day they were cut.

objects.ground: Lush flowering vines grow on a nearby trellis.

extras.text: These long strands of flowering vines have been wound together in two tubular shapes.  With enough connective vine between them, they fit perfectly over the shoulder and dangle down just past arm length.  The beautiful blossoms trail with each movement.

objects.ground: Small trailing vines grow from a tree here.

extras.text: This mesh of interwoven tiny vines grows naturally through some unknown magic. It shifts to conform to the hand and is flexible but durable.  Little colorful flowers bloom in sporadic places almost like intentional decoration.

objects.ground: A silvery silk gown hangs from a hook.

extras.text: Not just silk, this gown is woven from the webbing of the extremely rare Silverspider.  Named for the silvery shimmer of the webbing it produces, the threads of this creature are extremely strong and highly enchantable.  An entire gown like this is unbelievably rare and valuable.

objects.ground: A pair of silvery silk slippers are tucked in a corner.

extras.text: These delicate slippers are woven from the webbing of the extremely rare Silverspider.  Named for the silvery shimmer of the webbing it produces, the threads of this creature are extremely strong and highly enchantable.

objects.ground: A coil of silver cord lays here in the dust.

extras.text: This simple silvery cord is far more than meets the eye.  Such cords represent the connection between body and soul in astral travel.  It also tethers mortals to the physical world when traveling through the fey realms in the Reverie. Made more of magic than material, such a cord is a rare and valuable treasure.

objects.ground: A pile of dark fabric shimmers in the light.

extras.text: This dark cloak is dusted with glittering flecks to make it shimmer like the night sky.  The effect is captivating and strikingly beautiful.

objects.ground: A dark ombre robe with shifting luminescent sparkles rests here.

extras.text: At first glance this robe appears to be multicolored sparkles set against blue-black ombre dyed fabric.  After watching it for a bit, you notice the flecks of color subtly drift amongst the fabric, which shifts and flows as the robe moves.  This is not just a representation of the night sky, but a recreation of the cosmos in physical form!

objects.ground: Propped up in the corner is a staff with a glistening indigo stone.

extras.text: This otherwise unworked dark wood staff holds a palm-sized oval of dark blue starstone.  Hundreds of thousands of tiny mineral deposits within it reflect and refract light like stars twinkling in the dark, giving it its name. Though starstone itself is not inherently magical, a weapon like this almost certainly is!

objects.ground: A simple metal ring set with a glistening indigo gem lays here.

extras.text: This plain metal band made of either silver or electrum holds a small dark blue starstone gem.  Hundreds of thousands of tiny mineral deposits within it reflect and refract light like stars twinkling in the dark, giving it its name. Though starstone itself is not inherently magical, a ring like this almost certainly is!

objects.ground: A gleaming indigo gem on a leather cord lays amongst the rocks.

extras.text: From a leather cord dangles a dark blue starstone pendant.  Hundreds of thousands of tiny mineral deposits within it reflect and refract light like stars twinkling in the dark, giving it its name.  Though starstone itself is not inherently magical, a pendant like this almost certainly is!

objects.ground: A cluster of vibrant tropical flowers grows from a hanging vine.

extras.text: This spray of vivid vine-grown flowers is pleasing to both the eye and the nose.  The light sweet fragrance compliments the bold colors of the blossoms for an elegant overall feeling.  Still attached to the vine, these flowers look like they could be worn around the neck, woven into your hair, or worn on the collar as an accent to any outfit.

objects.ground: A flickering colorful spark floats by you laughing.

extras.text: Looking directly at this strange wispy spark, you develop a distinct sense of vertigo as waves of color start to creep into your field of vision.  Averting your eyes, a mix of ecstatic excitement and serene comfort washes over you as you begin to hear far away laughter and music.

objects.ground: Cobwebs seem to have been fashioned into some sort of garment.

extras.text: Made of cobwebs and bits of thread, this sheer skirt provides a small bit of coverage but is clearly more designed for aesthetics than modesty.  Walking the fine line between practical and fantastical, such clothing like this is a signature of the Fair Folk who walk the dreamlands of the Reverie.

objects.ground: A tiny white lily grows amongst the plants.

extras.text: This tiny white lily is barely the size of a fingernail.  Though set with a tiny pin backing, this lily looks fresh and new, as if sustained by magic.

objects.ground: An odd minute luminescent bubble rolls through the air.

extras.text: Translucent images and scenes take shape in the swirling luminescence.  Cute animals, scary monsters, exciting presents, delicious treats, the faces of loving parents and more coalesce bringing with them a myriad of emotions and feelings.  As quickly as they appear, they metamorphosize and vanish following the logical illogic of dreams.  Entranced by the dream-like dance, you realize these are the dreams of children, scooped from the Reverie and made visible.

objects.ground: A tiny pouch of glittering dust has been tossed on the ground.

extras.text: Looking inside this pouch of fur, you see a small pinch of gleaming dust. Light flashes over it, reflecting in rainbow colors.

objects.ground: A bracelet with a smoky crystal has been cast away here.

extras.text: Smoky quartz is a powerful mystic matrix because it energizes like clear quartz but also has strong connections to the realms of sleep and dreams.  Set in silver, a bracelet like this provides powerful connections to both the moon and the Reverie, making it highly prized by faeries and witches alike.

objects.ground: A necklace with a smoky crystal point lays hidden among the grass.

extras.text: Smoky quartz is a powerful mystic matrix because it energizes like clear quartz but also has strong connections to the realms of sleep and dreams.  Mounted in a silver setting, a pendant like this provides powerful connections to both the moon and the Reverie, making it highly prized by faeries and witches alike.

objects.ground: A ring with a smoky crystal has been dropped here.

extras.text: Smoky quartz is a powerful mystic matrix because it energizes like clear quartz but also has strong connections to the realms of sleep and dreams.  Set in silver, a ring like this provides powerful connections to both the moon and the Reverie, making it highly prized by faeries and witches alike.

objects.ground: Pale light swirls in a tiny pool on the ground.

extras.text: You pick up what can only be described as liquid light, gently swirling in a small pool.  The pool splits into two small droplets of equal size, each alight with similar incandescence.  Strangely, they do not leave any smears or traces behind, remaining perfectly coherent.

objects.ground: The long scorpion tail of a manticore lays here.
objects.action_desc: A manticore lashes out with its tail!

extras.text: Why do you have this?  You shouldn't have this.

objects.ground: A noxious cloud of paralyzing gas.
objects.action_desc: A gorgon exhales a cloud of &7&bparalyzing gas!&0

extras.text: Why do you have this?  You shouldn't have this.

objects.ground: At the apex of the old hill rests an ancient stone altar.

extras.text: This altar is formed from a single 10-foot slab of chiseled stone resting upon two smaller rough boulders.  The rock is scarred and stained all over, evidence of thousands of rituals through the centuries which took place at this megalith.  Numerous symbols have been carved into the altar, only to be either scratched out or eroded by time, suggesting this site has passed from the stewardship of one tradition to another over its long life.

objects.ground: A 30-foot tall gray stone partially enveloped by the forest stands here.

extras.text: The towering stone, also called a menhir, stands some 30 feet tall.  Stones such as these were often erected by religious traditions dedicated to the Old Gods hundreds, if not thousands, of years ago.  Often, they indicated places of great power or channeled the energy of leylines, bands of natural energy that crisscross the surface of the planet.  Like most menhir, this one bears no markings indicating what its purpose is.  Whether it is a natural formation, a man-made one, or somehow summoned directly from the bones of the earth itself isn't immediately obvious either.  Regardless of how it arrived here, or for what purpose, it seems quite at home in the forest.

objects.ground: A 30-foot tall gray stone partially enveloped by the forest stands here.

extras.text: The towering stone, also called a menhir, stands some 30 feet tall.  Stones such as these were often erected by religious traditions dedicated to the Old Gods hundreds, if not thousands, of years ago.  It seems this stone has undergone some kind of awakening, as it appears to be collecting and focusing massive energies, causing it to rumble with deep pitch and glow vibrantly.

objects.ground: Glowing moonlight reflects from the surface of a crystal-clear spring.

extras.text: This small spring wells up out of the ground into a natural stone pool.  The waters of the spring almost seem to glow on their own as they reflect the brilliant luminance of the moon.

objects.ground: This shouldn't be here, tell a god.
objects.action_desc: A faerie dragon exhales a cloud of &1e&3&bu&1p&2h&4o&6r&5i&0&1c&0 gas!

extras.text: This shouldn't be here, tell a god.

objects.ground: A narrow stone the size of a human being stands here.

extras.text: Just over 6' tall, this slender gray menhir stands sentinel near the crest of the hill, a guard protecting the central altar.  Like most menhir, this one bears no markings indicating what its purpose is.  Whether it is a natural formation, a man-made one, or somehow summoned directly from the bones of the earth itself isn't immediately obvious either.

objects.ground: Glimmering with incredible beauty is a silver belt set with sparkling lights.

extras.text: This belt appears to be made of small silver discs set with dark blue starstone hemispheres.  However, upon closer inspection, you realize the glittering dots within the hemispheres are not merely reflecting light - they are diminutive pinpoints of luminescence contained in some kind of crystalline matrix.  They swirl and float, giving a cosmic life to each disc.  Surely a treasure like this must be a gift from the Gods!

objects.ground: A single pinpoint of light twinkles against the dome of the sky.
objects.action_desc: A starseed twinkles brilliantly as you lift it aloft, illuminating your surroundings.

extras.text: Examining this tiny light more closely, it becomes obvious this is no meager glass or crystal.  It is the heart of a newborn star, breathed into creation through divine providence.  Within it lay all the hopes and dreams of creation, which perhaps could become another legendary soul, or a cosmic array of life and potential.

objects.ground: A constellation of three tiny points of soft light floats here.

extras.text: This small constellation is made up of three motes of light that seem to be somehow bound to each other.  They gently pulse and twinkle like tiny stars. Surely such a bauble is from another world!

objects.ground: A gleaming golden wreath waits here for someone to claim it.

extras.text: Not simply metal forged to look like leaves, this wreath seems to be woven from actual gold and silver leaves, like those of the mythical trees on the Island of Paradise.

objects.ground: Someone seems to have left the severed wings of a person-sized bird here!

extras.text: Wings this large must have come from some enormous bird.  Structured like the wings of an eagle, they must be some six feet in span.  Each feather is in pristine condition, indicating dedicated care and grooming.

extras.text: Somehow, sunlight seems to have woven into a delicate fabric.  It hangs perfectly from the body, draping it in a delicate, gentle warmth.

extras.text: Warm to the touch and bright as the morning light, this small ring seems to have no physical structure or support.  It appears to have been made of light fused into a semi-solid and stable shape that adjusts naturally in size.

extras.text: Motifs of the sun and its rays wrap around the pommel.  Upon picking up the copper pommel, a brilliant blade of light erupts from it!  The sword emits rays of sunlight, blazing like the sun at its zenith.  The palpable holy energy of the blade tingles as it runs down your arm.

extras.text: The pommel is decorated with a single upturned crescent moon.  Picking up the pommel, an ephemeral blade of glittering moonlight pours from it.  It shines with a holy radiance, a guiding light in the dark.  With each effortless swing, the blade sings with the music of the spheres.

objects.ground: A pair of silver snake bracers rest in the grass.

extras.text: A pair of entwining silver snakes forms a beautiful coil pattern which fits snuggly around the upper arm.  Fine filigree scales decorate each serpent giving them a realistic and life-like appearance.  Only the small crescent moons on the snakes' foreheads betray their ceremonial purpose.

objects.ground: A large polished disc with the image of a crescent sits upon an altar.

extras.text: This large circular shield appears to be made of silver or electrum.  It has a single curved line etched on its face, creating the image of a large crescent moon inscribed on a full moon.  Runes rune along the circular edge of the shield, forming a prayer to some ancient goddess.

objects.ground: A bell chiming a beautiful tone hangs in the wind.

extras.text: Inscribed with symbols of water and celestial bodies, this conical handbell has an appearance as beautiful as its sound.  The small hand bell is well polished and cleaned, though evidence of wear and use can be seen inside the cone.

objects.ground: A small ritual dagger of steel and black marble has been placed on an altar.

extras.text: With a handle of black marble, this double-edged dagger is ideally crafted for use in ritual magic.  A pentagram of mother-of-pearl is inlaid on the crossguard, symbolizing the union of the four directional Elements under Spirit.  Though black-handled athames are traditionally used for magic and not weaponry, it is still as sharp and dangerous as any other dagger.

objects.ground: Hanging from a fine chain is an ornate pentagram.

extras.text: The metallic image of a five pointed star is embossed on a small black disc, rimmed with what appears to be silver or platinum.  The image of the full moon, flanked on either side by mirrored crescents is lightly etched in the middle of the star.  Around the outer edge, various symbols representing the passage of time ring the pentagram.

objects.ground: Shimmering ethereal fabric dangles from a nearby tree in the moonlight.

extras.text: Multiple layers of barely tangible silver-blue fabric unfold into a full length robe with draping sleeves and hood.  The fabric itself is unlike any other in the world, seemingly made of pale light itself.  The robes are covered in tiny sequins that shimmer and quake with the slightest movement, giving the garment a shifting, scintillating appearance.

objects.short: a silver and quartz moon diadem
objects.ground: An exquisite crown of silver branches and crystals sits on a stone.

extras.text: A splay of intricately detailed silver branches forms the basis of this diadem. Affixed among the branches are several rough quartz points of various sizes, fanned out and pointing towards the heavens.  Set at the base of the diadem is an up-turned crescent moon.  The diadem clearly has some mystic purpose.

objects.ground: A string of small bells jingles in the breeze.
objects.action_desc: The delicate chain of bells jingles pleasantly.

extras.text: This small wristlet is made up of a set of tiny silver bells strung together on a leather cord.  They make a light, pleasant tinkling sound as you move.

objects.ground: A thin bracelet of intertwining silver and gold lay discarded here.

extras.text: Two thin strips of metal, one silver, one gold, twisted gently together form a simple, elegant bracelet.  Though it bears no signs of unique purpose, it would make an excellent accessory to just about any outfit.

objects.ground: A length of sheer ombre gossamer flutters in the breeze.

extras.text: This small gossamer scarf seems to be made of actual cobwebs and dyed for a beautiful ombre effect.  Scarves like these are often prized by the showier Fair Folk, especially faeries and pixies.

objects.ground: Resting on its side is a cast iron cauldron.

extras.text: Crudely smelted and cast to boil liquids, it is obvious this iron pot has been the origin of countless potions and mystic recipes over the years.  It looks like it would make a fine carrying vessel as well.

objects.ground: A small silver moon brooch has been left in a box.

extras.text: Looking closely at this finger-length brooch, you see a simple yet decorative crescent moon motif struck from silver.

objects.ground: A long flowing cloak, shining under the light of moon flutters in the breeze.

extras.text: You hold some unknown, almost ethereal material which has been fashioned into a cloak.  Its silver-blue color and innate luminescence makes it quite unlike any mundane fabric.  Amazingly soft to the touch, it seems this cloak was woven from the light of the moon itself.

objects.ground: A moonstone ring has been forgotten here, lost.

extras.text: Rings such as these are often used for devotional purposes as well as decorative ones.  The simple silver band has a colorful polished moonstone set into it.

objects.ground: A single glowing drop dangles from a twig.

extras.text: A crystal teardrop containing what appears to be a drop of pale silver-blue liquid light is set in a simple silver backing.

objects.ground: A dark blue beaded shawl hands on a hook nearby.

extras.text: Symbolic of maturity and often the Crone face of the Triple Goddess, this navy blue gossamer shawl is edged with a line of dark blue sparkling starstone beads and another of lustrous pale blue-green moonstones.  The reflective qualities of the semi precious gemstones interlaced with the natural sheen of the fabric threads give the impression of a starry night sky.

objects.ground: Swept up leaves sit in a big pile.

extras.text: Growing leafy vines have been interlaced into a living tapestry.  It wraps completely around the body, providing both camouflage and protection.

objects.ground: A small circle of green leaves sits on a stand.

extras.text: Many lush tree leaves have been woven together into a wrist-sized circle. Somehow the leaves seem fresh and green as the day they were cut.

objects.ground: Lush flowering vines grow on a nearby trellis.

extras.text: These long strands of flowering vines have been wound together in two tubular shapes.  With enough connective vine between them, they fit perfectly over the shoulder and dangle down just past arm length.  The beautiful blossoms trail with each movement.

objects.ground: Small trailing vines grow from a tree here.

extras.text: This mesh of interwoven tiny vines grows naturally through some unknown magic. It shifts to conform to the hand and is flexible but durable.  Little colorful flowers bloom in sporadic places almost like intentional decoration.

objects.ground: A silvery silk gown hangs from a hook.

extras.text: Not just silk, this gown is woven from the webbing of the extremely rare Silverspider.  Named for the silvery shimmer of the webbing it produces, the threads of this creature are extremely strong and highly enchantable.  An entire gown like this is unbelievably rare and valuable.

objects.ground: A pair of silvery silk slippers are tucked in a corner.

extras.text: These delicate slippers are woven from the webbing of the extremely rare Silverspider.  Named for the silvery shimmer of the webbing it produces, the threads of this creature are extremely strong and highly enchantable.

objects.ground: A coil of silver cord lays here in the dust.

extras.text: This simple silvery cord is far more than meets the eye.  Such cords represent the connection between body and soul in astral travel.  It also tethers mortals to the physical world when traveling through the fey realms in the Reverie. Made more of magic than material, such a cord is a rare and valuable treasure.

objects.ground: A pile of dark fabric shimmers in the light.

extras.text: This dark cloak is dusted with glittering flecks to make it shimmer like the night sky.  The effect is captivating and strikingly beautiful.

objects.ground: A dark ombre robe with shifting luminescent sparkles rests here.

extras.text: At first glance this robe appears to be multicolored sparkles set against blue-black ombre dyed fabric.  After watching it for a bit, you notice the flecks of color subtly drift amongst the fabric, which shifts and flows as the robe moves.  This is not just a representation of the night sky, but a recreation of the cosmos in physical form!

objects.ground: Propped up in the corner is a staff with a glistening indigo stone.

extras.text: This otherwise unworked dark wood staff holds a palm-sized oval of dark blue starstone.  Hundreds of thousands of tiny mineral deposits within it reflect and refract light like stars twinkling in the dark, giving it its name. Though starstone itself is not inherently magical, a weapon like this almost certainly is!

objects.ground: A simple metal ring set with a glistening indigo gem lays here.

extras.text: This plain metal band made of either silver or electrum holds a small dark blue starstone gem.  Hundreds of thousands of tiny mineral deposits within it reflect and refract light like stars twinkling in the dark, giving it its name. Though starstone itself is not inherently magical, a ring like this almost certainly is!

objects.ground: A gleaming indigo gem on a leather cord lays amongst the rocks.

extras.text: From a leather cord dangles a dark blue starstone pendant.  Hundreds of thousands of tiny mineral deposits within it reflect and refract light like stars twinkling in the dark, giving it its name.  Though starstone itself is not inherently magical, a pendant like this almost certainly is!

objects.ground: A cluster of vibrant tropical flowers grows from a hanging vine.

extras.text: This spray of vivid vine-grown flowers is pleasing to both the eye and the nose.  The light sweet fragrance compliments the bold colors of the blossoms for an elegant overall feeling.  Still attached to the vine, these flowers look like they could be worn around the neck, woven into your hair, or worn on the collar as an accent to any outfit.

objects.ground: A flickering colorful spark floats by you laughing.

extras.text: Looking directly at this strange wispy spark, you develop a distinct sense of vertigo as waves of color start to creep into your field of vision.  Averting your eyes, a mix of ecstatic excitement and serene comfort washes over you as you begin to hear far away laughter and music.

objects.ground: Cobwebs seem to have been fashioned into some sort of garment.

extras.text: Made of cobwebs and bits of thread, this sheer skirt provides a small bit of coverage but is clearly more designed for aesthetics than modesty.  Walking the fine line between practical and fantastical, such clothing like this is a signature of the Fair Folk who walk the dreamlands of the Reverie.

objects.ground: A tiny white lily grows amongst the plants.

extras.text: This tiny white lily is barely the size of a fingernail.  Though set with a tiny pin backing, this lily looks fresh and new, as if sustained by magic.

objects.ground: An odd minute luminescent bubble rolls through the air.

extras.text: Translucent images and scenes take shape in the swirling luminescence. Cute animals, scary monsters, exciting presents, delicious treats, the faces of loving parents and more coalesce bringing with them a myriad of emotions and feelings.  As quickly as they appear, they metamorphosize and vanish following the logical illogic of dreams.  Entranced by the dream-like dance, you realize these are the dreams of children, scooped from the Reverie and made visible.

objects.ground: A tiny pouch of glittering dust has been tossed on the ground.

extras.text: Looking inside this pouch of fur, you see a small pinch of gleaming dust. Light flashes over it, reflecting in rainbow colors.

objects.ground: A bracelet with a smoky crystal has been cast away here.

extras.text: Smoky quartz is a powerful mystic matrix because it energizes like clear quartz but also has strong connections to the realms of sleep and dreams.  Set in silver, a bracelet like this provides powerful connections to both the moon and the Reverie, making it highly prized by faeries and witches alike.

objects.ground: A necklace with a smoky crystal point lays hidden among the grass.

extras.text: Smoky quartz is a powerful mystic matrix because it energizes like clear quartz but also has strong connections to the realms of sleep and dreams.  Mounted in a silver setting, a pendant like this provides powerful connections to both the moon and the Reverie, making it highly prized by faeries and witches alike.

objects.ground: A ring with a smoky crystal has been dropped here.

extras.text: Smoky quartz is a powerful mystic matrix because it energizes like clear quartz but also has strong connections to the realms of sleep and dreams.  Set in silver, a ring like this provides powerful connections to both the moon and the Reverie, making it highly prized by faeries and witches alike.

objects.ground: Pale light swirls in a tiny pool on the ground.

extras.text: You pick up what can only be described as liquid light, gently swirling in a small pool.  The pool splits into two small droplets of equal size, each alight with similar incandescence.  Strangely, they do not leave any smears or traces behind, remaining perfectly coherent.

objects.short: &2a circlet of green leaves and trailing ivy&0
objects.ground: A circlet of leaves lies here, tossed aside.

extras.text: These vines of ivy are entwined with complimentary leaves and woven into a loose circle to make a beautiful garland.  It just fits on the crown of the head.  The long trailing ivy, holy in many Druidic traditions, creates a regal, statuesque silhouette.

objects.ground: A noxious cloud of paralyzing gas.
objects.action_desc: A gorgon exhales a cloud of &7&bparalyzing gas!&0

objects.ground: A ring made of tiny branches and leaves lies here.

extras.text: The ring is made of tiny, slender branches, still living, their equally tiny green leaves forming a wreath.

objects.ground: A shimmering glint of light shines from a small chain on the ground.

extras.text: A small ball of light glows from an unknown source, but somehow still remains attached to a shining platinum chain.  It looks like a common necklace, except for the small glint of light that emits tiny beams that illuminate the palm of your hand.  Occasionally the light grows brighter for an instant, then fades back to normal.

objects.ground: A small bracelet made of stone and gold beads is lying on the ground.

extras.text: The bracelet is formed from small beads of gold and grayish colored stones. It is very old and shows the marks from years of use.  The stone beads are cracked and worn down on the edges and a few of them have chipped apart.  The gold beads are starting to tarnish and fade, almost matching the dull luster of the stone, from prolonged contact with the sweat from the skin.

objects.ground: Someone has lost their loincloth.  How embarrassing!

extras.text: This loincloth is cut from high quality cloth and embellished with a small repeating geometric pattern around the edge.  Holding it in place is a belt trimmed with fur and closed with a large bronze clasp keeping it secure.

objects.ground: Someone has left a sumptuous silk robe behind.

extras.text: Woven from the highest quality silk available and dyed in a deep, vibrant scarlet, this long-sleeved robe is among the precious things you have ever handled. Cherry and plum blossoms are painstakingly embroidered in gold and silver thread across the kimono.

objects.ground: A pair of glittering ruby slippers sparkles in the light.
An ancient grimoire of powerful and esoteric magic lays here forgotten.

extras.text: This is the ancient book of thaumaturgy sought by the great Wizards of old. Dynasties have fallen, continents destroyed, just for a page from this book.

objects.ground: A wide-brimmed pointy black hat stands slouched over.
A small band of abyssal metal corrupts the world around it.
A small circle of undulating darkness hovers above the ground.

extras.text: Warm to the touch and bright as the morning light, this small ring seems to have no physical structure or support.  It appears to have been made of light fused into a semi-solid and stable shape that adjusts naturally in size.

objects.ground: Glimmering with incredible beauty is a silver belt set with sparkling lights.

extras.text: This belt appears to be made of small silver discs set with dark blue starstone hemispheres.  However, upon closer inspection, you realize the glittering dots within the hemispheres are not merely reflecting light - they are diminutive pinpoints of luminescence contained in some kind of crystalline matrix.  They swirl and float, giving a cosmic life to each disc.  Surely a treasure like this must be a gift from the Gods!

objects.ground: A single pinpoint of light twinkles against the dome of the sky.
objects.action_desc: A starseed twinkles brilliantly as you lift it aloft, illuminating your surroundings.

extras.text: Examining this tiny light more closely, it becomes obvious this is no meager glass or crystal.  It is the heart of a newborn star, breathed into creation through divine providence.  Within it lay all the hopes and dreams of creation, which perhaps could become another legendary soul, or a cosmic array of life and potential.

triggers.name: megalith_quest_priestess_greet
triggers.commands: * This trigger is different depending on stage and where in the stage the questor is at * set item1 (%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item1]%) set item2 (%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item2]%) set item3 (%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item3]%) set item4 (%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item4]%) if (%actor.vnum% == -1) &&(%actor.quest_stage[megalith_quest]% < 1) &&(%actor.level% < 100) wait 2 mecho %self.name% looks up, startled to see new faces. say Goddess be praised! wait 2s mecho %self.name% says, 'We were attacked by the Unseelie Court and their monstrosities on our journey here through the forest.  I am deeply in need of &6&bassistance&0!' * * Check in during stage 1, seeing if the questor has her tools or not * elseif (%actor.quest_stage[megalith_quest]% == 1) wait 2 mecho %self.name% says, 'Have you been able to find replacements for the sacred prophetic implements?  Do you need a reminder of your &6&b[progress]?&0' * * If all the Keepers have been helped in stage 2, give the incantation to start stage 3 * elseif (%actor.quest_stage[megalith_quest]% == 2) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item1]%) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item2]%) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item3]%) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item4]%) wait 2 say We're ready to finish calling the elements!  If you wish to proceed, repeat after me: mecho &0 mecho &6&bUnder the watchful eye of Earth, Air, Fire, and Water, we awaken this hallowed ground!&0 * * If all the Keepers have not been helped in stage 2, do a check in * elseif (%actor.quest_stage[megalith_quest]% == 2) wait 2 mecho %self.name% says, 'I hope your work with the Keepers is coming along well.  Do you need a reminder of your &6&b[progress]?&0' * * If all the reliquaries have been returned and stage 4 is ready to start, ask if ready to proceed * elseif (%actor.quest_stage[megalith_quest]% == 4) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:reliquary]%) wait 2 say It's time.  Are you ready to proceed? * * If all the reliquaries have not been returned yet in stage 3, do a check in * elseif (%actor.quest_stage[megalith_quest]% == 3) wait 2 say I hope you have had luck finding the reliquaries. * * If the quest was successfully completed, give a friendly welcome. * elseif %actor.has_completed[megalith_quest]% wait 2 if %actor.sex% == female say Hail and well met, Sister! elseif %actor.sex% == male say Hail and well met, Brother! else say Hail and well met! endif * * If the quest was failed, * elseif %actor.has_failed[megalith_quest]% wait 2 say Welcome back. wait 2 say Had that we reunited under better blessings... Wait 3s say Though perhaps we could try again? endif

triggers.name: priestess_speech1
triggers.argument_list: assist assistance assist? assistance? how what
triggers.commands: if %speech% /= assist || %speech% /= assistance || %speech% /= assist? || %speech% /= assistance? || %speech% /= how can I help? ||  %speech% /= how can I assist? || %speech% /= what can I do? || %speech% /= what can I do to assist? wait 2 mecho %self.name% says, 'Our coven came to this megalith to perform the &7&bGreat Rite of Invocation&0 and summon our faerie goddess The Great Mother, the Lady of the Stars.' endif

triggers.name: priestess_speech2
triggers.commands: if %speech% /= GREAT RITE OF INVOCATION? || %speech% /= GREAT RITE? || %speech% /= GREAT RITE OF INVOCATION || %speech% /= GREAT RITE wait 2 mecho %self.name% says, 'For generations, our coven has scoured the face of Ethilien to find a place where the touch of the &6&bOld Gods&0 might still be found.' wait 3s mecho %self.name% says, 'Performed correctly, this ritual will allow us to call to our Goddess in the Dreaming and provide a bridge across space and time back into the mortal realm.' endif

triggers.name: priestess_speech3
triggers.commands: If %speech% /= old gods || if %speech% /= old gods? || if %speech% /= why? wait 2 say You see, when the Nine Hells cracked open to vomit forth Sagece on Templace, the putrid rift she crawled through so corrupted the world around it, many of the Old Gods found their holy sites defiled and their physical access to Ethilien severed. wait 6s say The Great Mother was one such unfortunate victim. wait 3s say She is cast adrift in the Deep Dreaming, lost in that birthplace and graveyard of primordial stars.  The near-total annihilation of the elven race, constant assault on our world by demons, gods turning on each other in bloody slaughter... mecho &0 mecho %self.name% says, 'All these calamities along with centuries of unearned exile are weakening Her bond with our world.  Our Mother is still capable of gifting us her divine magic, but She is &6&bslipping away&0 from us.' endif

triggers.name: priestess_speech4
triggers.commands: if %speech% /= slipping away || %speech% /= slipping away? || %speech% /= how terrible || %speech% /= how sad  || %speech% /= what can be done? wait 2 say We began to lose hope until we found this ancient circle of standing stones.  But I believe this place is powerful enough for us to perform the Great Invocation Rite. wait 4s say Several of our sacred prophetic implements were damaged navigating the maze.  My Sisters are too busy tending to their duties preparing this site for the Great Rite to find suitable replacements. wait 5s mecho %self.name% says, 'But perhaps you would be willing to &6&bhelp us?&0' endif

triggers.name: megalith_quest_priestess_speech_start
triggers.commands: * This trigger serves as both the starting, restarting, and advancing from stage 3 to stage 4 trigger * If starting for the first time * if (%actor.quest_stage[megalith_quest]% < 1) quest start megalith_quest %actor.name% wait 2 say May the Goddess smile upon you! wait 1s mecho %self.name% says, 'First, I'll need your help replacing the &6&bimplements&0 destroyed in the maze getting here.' * * If restarting * elseif %actor.has_failed[megalith_quest]% quest restart megalith_quest %actor.name% mecho &0 smile say Then let us give it another go! mecho mecho %self.name% says, 'Some of our &6&bimplements&0 were destroyed in our previous attempt.' endif * * List tools for stage 1 * if (%actor.quest_stage[megalith_quest]% == 1) wait 2 mecho %self.name% says, 'We need the following: mecho - &7&bSalt&0. mecho mecho - A &6&bgoblet or chalice&0 to hold water. mecho &0    My home island in the Green Green Sea has several goblets, though do be mecho &0    careful which one you pick.  Some of them tend to be poisoned. mecho mecho &0    I understand there is a beautiful chalice recently lost from the Abbey of mecho &0    St. George that might work as well. mecho mecho - Some kind of &3censer&0 to burn incense in. mecho &0    There are a few other more nefarious religions which use incense burners in mecho &0    their rituals.  You may be able to steal one from them. mecho mecho - A &1&bcandle&0. mecho &0    Candles are common to light the dark in the far north, and in some mecho &0    underground communities.' wait 6s say Bring these to me to begin the Great Rite! wait 1s mecho %self.name% says, 'If you want to know more about what my Sisters and I are doing, you can ask any of us &6&bwho are you?&0' wait 1s mecho %self.name% says, 'If you need a reminder of your &6&b[progress]&0, you may ask me at any time.' bow %actor.name% * * If ready to continue stage 4 * elseif (%actor.quest_stage[megalith_quest] == 4) && (%self.room% == 12389) && (%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:reliquary]% == 1) wait 2 say The Great Rite of Invocation has a great deal of call and response.  I will chant a line and you must repeat it to continue the ritual.  The coven will chant their response after you do. wait 4s say Repeat after me. wait 2s emote raises her arms to the sky. mecho %self.name% chants, '&6&bGreat Lady of the Stars, hear our prayer!&0' quest variable megalith_quest %actor.name% prayer 1 endif

triggers.name: megalith_quest_priestess_receive
triggers.commands: * This trigger serves as the basis for the returning of items to the high priestess and advancing stages 1 and 3. * It is heavily copied from the Hot Springs quests. * Several of the stages have multiple items the questor could return. * Some can result in the quest variables [bad1-3] being placed on the character. * Ideally, there will be 0 [bad] * If there are 2 [bad] or more at the end, the final step of the quest will fail. * If bad4 is on, DISASTER will occur!! * There is currently no option to exchange items once they have been delivered * * What item is being turned in? * if %actor.quest_stage[megalith_quest]% == 1 set step replace our ritual implements * * Set the potential items that could be turned in in Stage 1 * * the expressions set item 2, set item 3, and set item 4 appear multiple times because multiple objects could satisfy the item requirement, but we only want to accept one. * Also create a variable so we can return the cup to the character in stage 3 * switch %object.vnum% * salt case 23756 set item 1 set this %object.shortdesc% break * hemlock goblet - BAD1 case 41111 set item 2 set goblet 41111 set this a drinking vessel break * rowan goblet case 41110 set this a drinking vessel set item 2 set goblet 41110 break * chalice case 18512 set item 2 set goblet 18512 set this a drinking vessel break * censer case 8507 set item 3 set this an incense burner break * thurible case 17300 set item 3 set this an incense burner break * candle case 8612 set item 4 set this spare candles break * candle case 58809 set item 4 set this spare candles break default halt done elseif %actor.quest_stage[megalith_quest]% == 3 set step summon %get.mob_shortdesc[12300]% * * Set the potential items that could be returned in Stage 3 * switch %object.vnum% * bowl case 23817 set item 1 set this %object.shortdesc% break * goddess skirt - BAD3 case 4305 set item 2 set this something from a goddess's regalia break * goddess torch - ALSO BAD3 case 4318 set item 2 set this something from a goddess's regalia break * goddess bracelet case 58015 set item 2 set this something from a goddess's regalia break * goddess ring case 58018 set item 2 set this something from a goddess's regalia break * faerie elixir - BAD4 - THE REALLY BAD ONE case 58426 set this something to serve as Her icon set item 3 break * faerie wings case 58418 set item 3 set this something to serve as Her icon break default halt done endif * * if you already gave us this item.  The value %item% has been set to appends item here, resulting in item1, item2, item3, and item4. * if %actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item%item%]% return 0 mecho %self.name% says, 'Thank you, but you already brought me %this%.' give %object.name% %actor.name% halt endif * * Using the process above, if the thing turned in didn't match item1 item 2 item 3 or item4 we can accept it now and set the quest variable. * wait 2 mecho %self.name% says, 'Blessed be!  Just what we need to %step%!' quest variable megalith_quest %actor.name% item%item% 1 if %object.vnum% == 41110 || %object.vnum% == 18512 || %object.vnum% == 41111 quest variable megalith_quest %actor.name% goblet %goblet% if %object.vnum% == 41111 quest variable megalith_quest %actor.name% bad1 1 endif elseif %object.vnum% == 4318 || %object.vnum% == 4305 quest variable megalith_quest %actor.name% bad3 1 elseif %object.vnum% == 58426 quest variable megalith_quest %actor.name% bad4 1 endif mjunk %object.name% * * See if we've turned in everything for this step * set item 1 while %item% <= 4 set item%item% 0 eval item %item% + 1 done if %actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item1]% set item1 1 endif if %actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item2]% set item2 1 endif if %actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item3]% set item3 1 endif if (%actor.quest_stage[megalith_quest]% != 1) || %actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item4]% set item4 1 endif * * If all the items have been turned in * if %item1% && %item2% && %item3% && %item4% wait 2 quest advance megalith_quest %actor.name% set item 1 * * Reset item variables with a while-loop * This quest uses 5 item variables, but only 4 are ever checked in this receive trigger.  Clear all 5 here just to be safe. * while %item% <= 5 quest variable megalith_quest %actor.name% item%item% 0 eval item %item% + 1 done wait 1s say I believe we're ready to proceed! wait 1s * * If turning everything in starts stage 2 * if %actor.quest_stage[megalith_quest]% == 2 emote carefully places each tool in its proper position on the altar. wait 2s mecho %self.name% proclaims, 'Rejoice!  The Great Work begins!' emote lights the candle. mecho %self.name% lifts her arms and turns her face skyward. mecho %self.name% chants: mecho 'O spirits of the ancient deep, mecho &0protect us as we undertake our magical working.' wait 6s msend %actor% %self.name% slowly fixes her gaze on you. mechoaround %actor% %self.name% slowly fixes her gaze on %actor.name%. wait 1s mecho %self.name% says, 'Next you'll work with the &7&bKeepers&0 to call the elements to protect us and awaken the sleeping land.  You can find them preparing the four enormous menhirs in the forest.  Please check in with them to see what resources they need.' wait 2s say Oh wait, I almost forgot! wait 2s * * Return the same drinking vessel from Stage 1 * set goblet %actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:goblet]% mload obj %goblet% mecho The coven high priestess takes %get.obj_shortdesc[%goblet%]% from the altar. mecho pour goblet out give goblet %actor.name% mecho mecho %self.name% says, 'You'll need this vessel again.  I've consecrated it for use in the Great Rite.' wait 3s say Now, go seek out the Keepers! * * If turning everything in starts stage 4 * elseif %actor.quest_stage[megalith_quest]% == 4 quest variable megalith_quest %actor.name% reliquary 1 emote reverentially places each of the reliquaries on the altar. wait 2 emote whispers, mecho 'By the power of three times three, mecho &0As I will it, so shall it be.' wait 4s emote breathes deeply and flexes her hands. wait 3s say It's time. wait 2s emote says in a hushed but excited tone, 'Are you ready?' endif * * If we need more stuff * else wait 2 say If you have the other necessaries, please give them to me. endif

get one prize * elseif %total% == 1 quest advance megalith_quest %actor.name% mecho The stars coalesce into the nearly transparent form of a celestial, gossamer-winged goddess. mecho %self.name% and %get.mob_shortdesc[12307]% bow before %get.mob_shortdesc[12300]%. mecho %self.name% says, 'O Great Mother, watcher from the deep, we come to seek thy blessing!' if %get.mob_count[12300]% == 0 mload mob 12300 endif mecho %get.mob_shortdesc[12300]% says, 'My daughters, you shall always have my blessing.' mecho %get.mob_shortdesc[12300]% gently kisses each member of the coven on their forehead, leaving a glowing mote of &b&7silvery light&0. wait 5s mecho %get.mob_shortdesc[12300]% says, 'Long has it been since the Nine Hells opened wide and I was cut off from the mortal world.' wait 3s mecho %get.mob_shortdesc[12300]% says, 'Yet through you and your mothers and grandmothers before you, my presence has been kept alive.' mecho %get.mob_shortdesc[12300]% smiles serenely. wait 6s mecho %get.mob_shortdesc[12300]% declares, 'Let this sacred megalith be home to our coven once again! May you keep well this sacred duty.' wait 7s mechoaround %actor% Turning to %actor.name%, %get.mob_shortdesc[12300]% says, 'And you, %actor.name%. msend %actor% Turning to you, %get.mob_shortdesc[12300]% says, 'And you, %actor.name%. mecho &0I would thank you for helping my daughters. triggers.commands: wait 2 if %actor.quest_stage[%type%_wand]% == %wandstep% && !%actor.has_failed[megalith_quest]% eval minlevel (%wandstep% - 1) * 10 if %actor.level% >= %minlevel% if %actor.quest_variable[%type%_wand:greet]% == 0 mecho %self.name% says, 'I see you're crafting something.  If you want my help, we can talk about &6&b[upgrades]&0.' else say Do you have what I need for the wand? endif wait 1s endif endif set stage %actor.quest_stage[megalith_quest]% switch %self.vnum% * * North * case 12303 if %actor.has_completed[megalith_quest]% cheer wait 1s say I can feel the Earth rejoicing from here to Templace!  Surely with Her blessing we can move to cleanse the ancient home of my people. elseif %actor.has_failed[megalith_quest]% emote drops to the ground. wait 1s say All hope is lost...  Without Her blessing, the demons will rampage forever. elseif (%stage% == 2) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item4]% == 1) bow %actor.name% wait 1s say I thank you most humbly for your assistance with calling the Spirits of Earth. elseif %stage% > 2 say Finally, our Mother Goddess will be able to walk our world again! elseif (%stage% == 2) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item4]% /= 0) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:north]% /= 0) bow %actor.name% mecho %self.name% speaks in voice like a gentle breeze across sunlit grass, 'Are you here to help me summon the Spirits of Earth to protect our coven?' elseif (%stage% == 2) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item4]% /= 0) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:north]% /= 1) say Do you have the granite ring? endif break * * South * case 12304 if %actor.has_completed[megalith_quest]% say This land is again full with the pulse, the pull, the bloodpump of creation... bow %actor.name% wait 1s say Thanks to you. elseif %actor.has_failed[megalith_quest]% mecho %self.name% begins to mutter to the standing stone, 'Destruction, greater than you or I can ever imagine...' wait 1s mecho %self.name% continues to mutter... 'A wave of protean fire curls around the planet and bares the world clean as bone...' elseif (%stage% == 2) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item2]% == 1) nod %actor.name% wait 1s say I thank you most humbly for your assistance with calling the Spirits of Fire. elseif %stage% > 2 mecho %self.name% whispers, 'Feel that?  That tingle in your veins?' wait 1s say That is the Lady of the Stars.  She approaches... mecho %self.name% takes a deep breath and exhales a cloud of &1&bs&0&1p&0&3&ba&0&1r&0&3k&0&3&bs&0! elseif (%stage% == 2) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item2]% /= 0) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:south]% /= 0) nod %actor.name% say Hail traveler. wait 2 mecho In a whisper like smokey ash %self.name% says, 'Are you here to help me summon the Spirits of Fire to protect our coven?' elseif (%stage% == 2) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item2]% /= 0) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:south]% /= 1) sat I hope you brought the flaming jewel from Vulcera. endif break * * East * case 12305 if %actor.has_completed[megalith_quest]% dance %actor.name% wait 4 say Finally we might be able to heal my poor family in Nordus! wait 3s say Can't you feel it?  The breath, the pull... emote exclaims in a ringing voice, 'Glory to - !!' laugh elseif %actor.has_failed[megalith_quest]% emote stands completely still, staring off into the void. Wait 10 say Huh. elseif (%stage% == 2) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item3]% == 1) wave %actor.name% wait 4 say Thanks so much for your help with the Air Spirits! elseif %stage% > 2 mecho %self.name% proclaims, 'Rejoice, the Great Work continues!  Soon the Faerie Goddess will be with us!' elseif (%stage% == 2) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item3]% /= 0) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:east]% /= 0) wave %actor.name% wait 4 mecho In a jubilant tone, %self.name% says, 'Hi there! Are you here to help me summon the Spirits of Air to protect our coven?' elseif (%stage% == 2) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item3]% /= 0) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:east]% /= 1) wait 2 say I hope you were able to recover that cloud bracelet! endif break * * West * case 12306 if %actor.has_completed[megalith_quest]% emote stifles tears of joy. wait 1s say I am overjoyed to see my Mother once again!  I can hear the rivers sing across Ethilien.  Our coven may be able to bring balance where the Dreaming flooded into the mortal realm at last. elseif %actor.has_failed[megalith_quest]% say A catastrophe...  As terrible as the night the Dream engulfed the Syric Mountains... Wait 2s emote begins to slip into a fugue. Wait 4s say I still remember that night... elseif (%stage% == 2) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item4]% == 1) curtsy %actor.name% wait 2s say Spirits of Water overflow from the Dreaming into this realm, thanks to you! elseif %stage% > 2 say Thanks to you, soon the Great Mother will be able to come from the Deep Dreaming once more! hug %actor.name% elseif (%stage% == 2) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item4]% /= 0) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:west]% /= 0) curtsy %actor.name% wait 1s say Merry met! wait 2s mecho %self.name% speaks in a silver voice, like bells reverberating over water, 'Are you here to help me summon the Spirits of Water to protect our coven?' elseif (%stage% == 2) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item4]% /= 0) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:west]% /= 1) say Have you been able to bring me some water? endif done

Please retrieve one for me.' wait 6s mecho %self.name% says, 'Remember, we must call the elements in order: mecho &0&3&bEast&0, &1South&0, &6&bWest&0, &2&bNorth&0 mecho &0so please start with &3&b%get.mob_shortdesc[12305]%&0.' bow %actor.name% quest variable megalith_quest %actor.name% north 1 halt endif break * * South - Fiery Eye from Vulcera * case 12304 If %actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:south]% == 0 say Excellent. wait 4 mecho %self.name% says, 'There is an island in the sea where fires of the deep meet the outer world, ruled by a demigoddess. If you can retrieve it, I believe that would be the perfect offering to the Spirits of Fire.' quest variable megalith_quest %actor.name% south 1 wait 4s mecho %self.name% says, 'Remember, we must call the elements in order: mecho &0&3&bEast&0, &1South&0, &6&bWest&0, &2&bNorth&0 mecho &0So please start with &3&b%get.mob_shortdesc[12305]%&0.' wait 2s nod %actor.name% say Good hunting. halt endif break * *  East - cumulus bracelet * case 12305 if %actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:east]%  == 0 say Hurray! clap wait 1s say There are a handful of places in the world where the clouds reach from the ground to the heavens.  One such place is the home to an ancient silver dragon. wait 1s laugh say Don't worry, you don't need to mess with him on my behalf. wait 2s say His guardians on the other hand... grin wait 4s mecho %self.name% says, 'Some carry &7&bcumulus cloud bracelets&0.  If you can get your hands on one, it'll boost my call to the Air Spirits right through the stratosphere!' wait 6s mecho %self.name% says, 'Remember, we have to cast in order: mecho &0&0&3&bEast&0, &1South&0, &6&bWest&0, &2&bNorth&0 mecho &0So when you return the offerings, please start with &3&bme&0!' quest variable megalith_quest %actor.name% east 1 wait 5s say Why are you still standing here?! wait 2 say Go!  Go! halt endif break * * West - Spring Water * case 12306 if %actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:west]% == 0 say Wonderful! wait 2s say As a creature of the Dreaming, my magic is especially fueled by energies that thin the veil between the worlds. wait 3s mecho %self.name% says, 'My faerie sisters have told me there is a &6&bhidden spring in the surrounding forest&0.  Over the ages, it has absorbed the gentle radiance of the moon, making it ideally sympathetic with the power of the Reverie.  Even the waters from my home in the Kingdom of Dreams would pale in comparison!' wait 6s mecho %self.name% says, 'Please, take the cup you gave to the priestess, &6&bfill it with water from that spring&0, and bring it back with water for me to offer the Spirits of the West.' wait 6s ponder say Although this spring sounds ideal, I suppose any water will do. quest variable megalith_quest %actor.name% west 1 wait 3s mecho %self.name% says, 'Remember, we must call the elements in order: mecho &0&3&bEast&0, &1South&0, &6&bWest&0, &2&bNorth&0 mecho &0So please start with &3&b%get.mob_shortdesc[12305]%&0.' curtsy %actor.name% halt endif done elseif %speech% == no wait 2 shrug say Alright then. endif endif

triggers.name: megalith_quest_keeper_receive
triggers.commands: * This trigger is used to collect all the items for stage 2 set item %object.vnum% set me %self.vnum% switch %self.vnum% * North, Earth - Granite Ring from Tech case 12303 set direction north set part 4 set next 12301 set need 55020 break * South, Fire - Fiery Eye from Fiery Island case 12304 set direction south set part 2 set next 12306 set need 48109 break * East, Air - cumulus bracelet from Dargentan case 12305 set direction east set part 1 set next 12304 set need 8301 break * West, Water - water from the hidden spring, or not - BAD STUFF * This Keeper's request is the one to watch out for. case 12306 set direction west set part 3 set next 12303 set need %actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:goblet]% done if %actor.quest_stage[megalith_quest]% == 2 if (%item% == %need%) || (%me% == 12306 && (%item% == 41110 || %item% == 41111 || %item% == 18512)) * Already given, right item if %actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item%part%]% == 1 return 0 shake say You've already given me this. halt elseif %actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:%direction%]% == 1 * Right item, wrong order if (%part% > 1) eval check %part% - 1 if (%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item%check%]% == 0) return 0 shake mecho %self.name% says, 'We must cast the circle in order: mecho East, South, West, North. mecho Please deliver your offerings in that order.' halt endif endif * Right set, wrong specific vessel at West if ((%me% == 12306) && ((%item% != %need%) || (%object.val2% != 0))) return 0 shake say I need water returned in the cup %get.mob_shortdesc[12301]% has consecrated. halt * unique part of the incantation else wait 2 quest variable megalith_quest %actor.name% %direction% 0 quest variable megalith_quest %actor.name% item%part% 1 if %direction% == north say Ah, excellent!  This will make a perfect offering. wait 6 mecho %self.name% places %object.shortdesc% before the menhir and kneels. wait 2s mecho %self.name% chants: mecho 'Hail to the guardian Spirits of the North mecho &0Spirits of Earth and Determination elseif %direction% == south say Marvelous!  This will make a perfect offering. wait 6 mecho %self.name% raises %object.shortdesc% above her head. wait 2s mecho %self.name% chants: mecho 'Hail to the guardian Spirits of the South mecho &0Spirits of Fire and Feeling elseif %direction% == east say Great!  This will make a perfect offering. wait 6 mecho %self.name% shakes out %object.shortdesc% like a blanket. mecho She watches with delight as it dissolves into wisps of cloudy mist. wait 4s mecho %self.name% chants: mecho 'Hail to the guardian Spirits of the East mecho &0Spirits of Air and Intellect elseif %direction% == west if %actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item5]% == 1 say Ah, delightful!  This water will make a perfect offering. wait 6 else say This will do. quest variable megalith_quest %actor.name% bad2 1 wait 6 endif mecho %self.name% pours the water from %object.shortdesc% before the menhir. wait 2s mecho %self.name% chants: mecho 'Hail to the guardian Spirits of the West mecho &0Spirits of Water and Intuition endif mecho &0I present this offering to you. mecho &0Aid us in our magical working on this great day.' wait 5s mjunk %object.name% mecho The menhir begins to hum and glow! wait 3s * Next person if (%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item1]%) && (%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item2]%) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item3]%) &&(%actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:item4]%) say Now, return to %get.mob_shortdesc[12301]% at the altar and help her finish the call! else say Now, proceed to %get.mob_shortdesc[%next%]% and continue invoking the elements. endif endif endif endif endif

triggers.name: megalith_quest_mother_act_kneel_rewards
triggers.commands: return 0 switch %cmd% case k halt done wait 2 if %actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:bad1]% == 1 set bad1 1 endif if %actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:bad2]% == 1 set bad2 1 endif if %actor.quest_variable[megalith_quest:bad3]% == 1 set bad3 1 endif if %actor.quest_stage[megalith_quest]% == 5 eval total %bad1% + %bad2% + %bad3% if %total% /= 0 msend %actor% %self.name% gently leans forward and kisses your brow. mechoaround %actor% %self.name% gently leans forward and kisses %actor.name%'s brow. wait 2s mecho %self.name% says, 'I bestow upon you the gifts of stars.  May their light mecho &0guide you the rest of your days.' mload obj 12398 mload obj 12399 give belt-stars %actor% give starseed %actor% set gem 0 while %gem% < 3 eval drop %random.11% + 55736 mload obj %drop% eval gem %gem% + 1 done give all.gem %actor.name% elseif %total% > 0 msend %actor% %self.name% places her hand on your shoulder. mechoaround %actor% %self.name% places her hand on %actor.name%'s shoulder. wait 2s mecho %self.name% says, 'I bestow upon you a gift of stars.  May its light mecho &0guide you the rest of your days.' set random %random.2% if %random% == 1 mload obj 12398 elseif %random% == 2 mload obj 12399 endif set gem 0 while %gem% < 3 eval drop %random.11% + 55736 mload obj %drop% eval gem %gem% + 1 done give all %actor.name% wait 4 bow %actor.name% endif * * Clear all the Bads, just in case * set item 1 while %item% <= 5 quest variable megalith_quest %actor.name% bad%item% 0 unset bad%item% eval item %item% + 1 done quest complete megalith_quest %actor.name% * * Set X to the level of the award - code does not run without it * if %actor.level% < 70 set expcap %actor.level% else set expcap 70 endif set expmod 0 if %expcap% < 9 eval expmod (((%expcap% * %expcap%) + %expcap%) / 2) * 55 elseif %expcap% < 17 eval expmod 440 + ((%expcap% - 8) * 125) elseif %expcap% < 25 eval expmod 1440 + ((%expcap% - 16) * 175) elseif %expcap% < 34 eval expmod 2840 + ((%expcap% - 24) * 225) elseif %expcap% < 49 eval expmod 4640 + ((%expcap% - 32) * 250) elseif %expcap% < 90 eval expmod 8640 + ((%expcap% - 48) * 300) else eval expmod 20940 + ((%expcap% - 89) * 600) endif * * Adjust exp award by class so all classes receive the same proportionate amount * switch %actor.class% case Warrior case Berserker * * 110% of standard * eval expmod (%expmod% + (%expmod% / 10)) break case Paladin case Anti-Paladin case Ranger * * 115% of standard * eval expmod (%expmod% + ((%expmod% * 2) / 15) break case Sorcerer case Pyromancer case Cryomancer case Illusionist case Bard * * 120% of standard * eval expmod (%expmod% + (%expmod% / 5)) break case Necromancer case Monk * * 130% of standard * eval expmod (%expmod% + (%expmod% * 2) / 5) break default set expmod %expmod% done msend %actor% &3&bYou gain experience!&0 eval setexp (%expmod% * 10) set loop 0 while %loop% < 10 * * Xexp must be replaced by mexp, oexp, or wexp for this code to work * Pick depending on what is running the trigger * mexp %actor% %setexp% eval loop %loop% + 1 done endif
